name: Water Invasion
description:
Simple 2d shmup created for the mini game assignment of gdd.

Credits for materials used:

Background images by Luis Zuno (@ansimuz)

JellyFish Sprite by Andrew Tidey, andrewtidey.blogspot.co.uk

Player and enemy missiles by Kenny, www.kenney.nl

Enemy submarine sprite by Bevouliin, http://bevouliin.com

Explosion sprites by Master484, http://m484games.ucoz.com/

Player death sound by bolkmar, https://tinyurl.com/cmc3hnf3

Jellyfish death sound by deoking, https://tinyurl.com/73r9t65c

Music by Juhani Junkala
